title.narrative: Zanzibar Energy Sector Transformation and Access Project

description.narrative: The objectives of the Project are to expand access to reliable and efficient electricity services and to scale up renewable energy generation in Zanzibar.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Water, Energy and Minerals of Zanzibar

activity-date.narrative: Actual end date of the activity
Actual end date of the activity
Actual start date of the activity

Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA

description.narrative: Total Commitment in Second Quarter of 2021
Total Disbursement in Second Quarter of 2022

condition.narrative: Section I.B.1(a) of Schedule to the Project Agreement:By no later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, MoWEM shallestablish, and thereafter maintain throughout the Project's implementation period, a Steering Committee chaired by the PrincipalSecretary of MoWEM and comprising representatives of other relevant MDAs.

Section I.B.1(b) of Schedule to the Project Agreement:By no later than three (3) months after the Effective Date, MoWEM shallestablish, and thereafter maintain throughout the Project's implementation period, a Technical Committee chaired by MoWEM'sDirector (Energy and Minerals), comprising members of key MDAs acceptable to the Association, which committee shall havefunctions, responsibilities and resources satisfactory to the Association.

Section I.B.1(d) of the Schedule to the Project AgreementBy no later than the Effective Date, MoWEM shall establish, andthereafter maintain throughout the implementation period of its Respective Parts of the Project, a Project implementation unit withstructure, composition, mandate/functions, powers and resources satisfactory to the Association (‘MoWEM-PIU’).

Section I.B.1(e) of the Schedule to the Project AgreementBy no later than the Effective Date, ZECO shall establish, and thereaftermaintain throughout the implementation period of its Respective Parts of the Project, a dedicated implementation unit withstructure, composition, mandate/functions, powers and resources satisfactory to the Association (‘ZECO-IU’).

Section I.B.2(b) of the Schedule to the Project Agreement:ZECO shall select and hire, by no later than two (2) months after theEffective Date, and thereafter maintain throughout the implementation period of its Respective Parts of the Project, the servicesof a reputable environmental and social development consulting firm, with qualifications and experience and under terms ofreference agreed with the Association, in order to assist ZECO-IU with, and develop ZECO's institutional capacity.

Section I.D. of the Schedule to the Project Agreement:In carrying out the activities under Sub-Components 1.1. and 1.2 of theProject, ZECO shall ensure that the supply and installation contracts for the BESS and the design and construction contract for thesolar PV power generation plant include the obligation of the respective contractors to: (a) operate and maintain the respectiveassets during the initial years of their commercial operation; and (b) build ZECO's capacity transferring the operations andmaintenance know-how to ZECO's team, all under terms and conditions satisfactory to the Association.

Section I.F.1 & 2 of the Schedule to the Project Agreement:The Project Implementing Entities shall each ensure that theirRespective Parts of the Project are: (a) carried out in accordance with the Environmental and Social Standards in a manneracceptable to the Association; and (b) ensure that their Respective Parts of the Project are implemented in accordance with theESCP, in a manner acceptable to the Association, including actions and measure specified therein to be implemented with duediligence and efficiency, the provision of sufficient funds therefor, and the maintenance of policies, procedures and retention ofqualified staff in adequate numbers, as specified in the ESCP.

Section I.F.6 of the Schedule to the Project AgreementMoWEM shall, by not later than one (1) year after the Effective Date,prepared and thereafter implement a six-year gender action plan aimed at promoting gender equality in the power sector, in a mannerand substance satisfactory to the Association.

Sections I.C.1 of the Schedule to the Project Agreements:The Project Implementing Entities (i.e. Zanzibar and ZECO) shall prepareand adopt a Project implementation manual in a manner and substance satisfactory to the Association and shall thereafter implementtheir Respective Parts of the Project in accordance therewith.
